summary: In the castle Vogeloed, a few aristocrats are awaiting baroness Safferstätt. But first count Oetsch invites himself.. Everyone thinks he murdered his brother, baroness Safferstat's first ... See full summary »
cast: Arnold Korff|Lulu Kyser-Korff|Lothar Mehnert|Paul Hartmann|Paul Bildt|Olga Tschechowa|Victor Bluetner|Hermann Vallentin|Julius Falkenstein|Robert Leffler|Walter Kurt Kuhle|Loni Nest|Ursula Nest|Georg Zawatzky
title: El castillo Vogeloed
